title: Main Landing Page Load and Interaction
description: Verify that the main landing page loads correctly with hero section, animated text, and call-to-action buttons fully functional.

steps.description: Navigate to the main landing page URL
Validate that the hero section is visible
Check animated text plays smoothly without glitches
Verify call-to-action buttons are displayed and clickable
Click each call-to-action button
Confirm corresponding actions or navigation events occur

title: Liquid Ether Background Rendering and Performance
description: Ensure the WebGL Liquid Ether background component renders fluid simulations smoothly and efficiently across supported devices.

steps.description: Navigate to a page with the Liquid Ether background component
Confirm the WebGL fluid simulation background is visible
Verify fluid simulation animations run smoothly without lag or dropped frames
Test performance metrics to ensure resource usage stays within acceptable limits

title: Interactive 3D Lanyard Animation Functionality
description: Verify the 3D lanyard animation loads, renders properly, and responds to physics-based interactions using React Three Fiber and Rapier.

steps.description: Navigate to the page or component containing the 3D lanyard animation
Confirm the 3D lanyard model is rendered and visible
Interact with the lanyard element (e.g., drag, rotate, or apply forces if supported)
Verify physics-based behaviors update correctly, showing realistic movement and collision
Ensure animation runs without glitches or frame drops

title: Developer Portfolio Page Load and Interactivity
description: Confirm that both pages of the developer portfolio load fully and display interactive lanyards and detailed content correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to the developer portfolio pages
Verify all interactive lanyards are displayed and responsive
Check that detailed content sections are loaded with correct information
Interact with portfolio elements (e.g., expand content, hover or click animations)
Confirm interactions trigger expected responses without errors

title: Scroll Stack 3D Scroll Effect and Particle Animation
description: Verify that scroll stack component triggers 3D scroll effects and particle animations correctly during user scrolling.

steps.description: Navigate to the section containing the Scroll Stack component
Scroll through the component vertically
Validate that 3D scroll effects activate and image cards respond with correct animations
Confirm particle animations play consistently and enhance the visual effect

title: Horizontal Scroll 'How It Works' Section Functionality
description: Test horizontal scrolling behavior of the 'How It Works' section, ensuring smooth scrolling and content visibility.

steps.description: Navigate to the 'How It Works' horizontal scroll section
Perform horizontal scroll gesture or use scroll controls if available
Verify each step or card in the section scrolls into view smoothly
Check that animations or visual transitions trigger at correct scroll positions

title: Feature Cards Interaction and Hover Animation
description: Confirm that feature cards display properly and hover animations are triggered to enhance user engagement.

steps.description: Navigate to the feature cards section
Verify all feature cards are displayed correctly with appropriate content
Hover over each feature card
Check that hover animations are smooth and visually appealing

title: Live Heatmap Preview Dynamic Data and Animation
description: Validate the live demand heatmap displays animated pulses accurately representing dynamic data updates.

steps.description: Navigate to the heatmap preview component
Verify the heatmap is visible and initially rendered correctly
Observe the animated pulses and confirm they represent changing data points fluidly
Simulate or provide sample data input to the heatmap component
Confirm the heatmap updates and animations correspond to input data changes

title: Animated Counter Component Number Transitions
description: Test the animated counter for smooth and accurate number transitions reflecting statistical data values.

steps.description: Locate the animated counter component on a page
Trigger counter updates with different numerical values
Verify the number animates smoothly without abrupt jumps or freezes
Confirm the final displayed number matches the input value

title: Typing Text Effect Animation
description: Verify the typewriter style typing text effect displays text progressively and visually correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to component or section with the typing text effect
Confirm the text appears character-by-character in timed sequence
Check for consistent timing and no overlaps or skips in text rendering

title: Animated Text Reveal Effects using Framer Motion
description: Ensure text reveal animations powered by Framer Motion trigger on scroll or load as designed.

steps.description: Navigate to the animated text component in the page
Scroll or interact to trigger reveal animations
Verify text reveal animations occur smoothly and match design timing

title: Footer Component Display and Interaction
description: Validate footer component renders contact information and call-to-action buttons correctly and handles interactions.

steps.description: Scroll to or navigate to the footer section
Confirm all contact info elements are visible and correctly formatted
Verify presence and visibility of call-to-action buttons
Click each call-to-action button
Ensure expected navigation or actions occur without error

title: Error Boundary Catch and Fallback UI
description: Test React Error Boundary captures runtime errors gracefully and displays user-friendly fallback UI without crashing.

steps.description: Intentionally throw an error inside a component wrapped by the Error Boundary
Verify that the error boundary catches the error
Confirm fallback UI is rendered with user-friendly error message
Check that the application remains functional and interactive despite the error

title: Global Styles and Tailwind CSS Theming Consistency
description: Verify global styles apply correctly with Tailwind configuration and theme colors and fonts without conflicts or visual issues.

steps.description: Load pages and components using global styles
Validate that theme colors, fonts, and animation styles match the HemoHive design specification
Check for absence of style conflicts or unexpected overrides

title: Webpack Configuration Loads Three.js, GLSL, and GLB Files Properly
description: Verify that Webpack configuration supports importing and rendering Three.js assets, GLSL shaders, and GLB models without build or runtime errors.

steps.description: Build the application with Webpack using next.config.js
Confirm build completes without errors related to Three.js, GLSL, or GLB imports
Load components that utilize these assets, such as 3D Lanyard Animation and WebGL backgrounds
Verify 3D models and shaders are rendered correctly on the page at runtime
